page.title: 19Housing in Newquay
page.content: {(Refer to Page 14 for background) { { }The largest category was semi- detached(64);next detached(59); followed by:bungalow(47);terrace(30); council(15);hotel(12);guest-house(9); cottage(9);flat(4);farmhouse(2);public house(2);married quarters(1);renovated mill(1). {The numbers of bedrooms were: { 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 more {Semi. } 3 33 14 6 3 2 1 0 1 {Det. } 0 17 23 10 2 1 1 0 2 {Bung. } 2 25 12 5 1 0 0 0 1 {Terr. } 1 18 4 0 2 0 2 0 1 {Cncl.} 1 13 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 {Cott.} 2 4 3 0 0 0 0 0 0 {Unspec.}2 15 7 7 2 1 1 1 0 {Others }2 3 3 0 1 1 0 0 0 {Guest.} from 5 to 12 {Hotel } from 10 to 26
